name: Dangerous Command Blocker
description: Prevents execution of dangerous commands like rm -rf to protect your system from accidental data loss.
author: disler

name: Code Quality Validator
description: Enforces clean code standards by checking function length, file length, and nesting depth on every file edit.
author: decider

name: Package Age Checker
description: Prevents installation of outdated npm/yarn packages and suggests newer versions automatically.
author: decider

name: Task Completion Notifier
description: Sends mobile and desktop notifications when Claude finishes tasks via Pushover, macOS, or Linux alerts.
author: decider

name: Context Injector
description: Automatically injects project-specific context and guidelines into user prompts before Claude processes them.
author: disler

name: Transcript Backup
description: Automatically backs up conversation transcripts before compaction operations to prevent data loss.
author: disler

name: Multi-Agent Observability
description: Real-time monitoring and tracking for Claude Code agents through simple hook event logging and visualization.
author: disler

name: Session Context Loader
description: Loads development environment context and project-specific settings when Claude Code sessions start.
author: disler

name: Git Auto-Commit
description: Automatically creates git commits with AI-generated messages when Claude completes significant code changes.
author: timoconnellaus

name: File Operation Logger
description: Logs all file read, write, and edit operations for audit trails and debugging purposes.
author: decider

name: Test Runner Hook
description: Automatically runs test suites after code edits and prevents commits if tests fail.
author: decider

name: Credential Scanner
description: Scans code changes for accidentally committed secrets, API keys, and credentials before execution.
author: decider

name: Subagent Completion Tracker
description: Tracks and logs completion of Claude Code subagent tasks for workflow monitoring and optimization.
author: disler

name: Session Cleanup
description: Performs cleanup tasks when sessions end, including temp file removal and resource deallocation.
author: disler

name: Tool Usage Regulator
description: Enforces policies on tool usage, such as forcing Tavily over WebFetch or blocking certain operations.
author: fcakyon
